name: get_articles
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool climate_news_feed.
Tool description: Climate Change news from the most trusted sources. Nasa, UN, and more. Flexible, reliable, and fast with low latency. Includes thumbnails, filtering, and pagination
API description: Gets all articles.

query examples:
source = United Nations, Nasa Climate, The Guardian, Carbon Brief
Limit = 100 (default)
exclude=The Guardian

limit.description: Number of articles to fetch. Default is 50.

exclude.description: Source to exclude from the results. Default is 'The Guardian'.

source.description: Source to fetch articles from. Default is 'Nasa Climate'.
